main event: A civilian reported an unidentified object striking the roof of a trailer house in Marshalltown, Iowa on June 3, 1958 between 9 and 9:30 PM.
interesting points: The object struck with a loud report or 'rifle shot' sound.
The person who witnessed the incident found many fragments, with the largest piece being submitted for investigation.
The witness initially thought the object was a meteor fragment, but after hearing a radio broadcast about a similar incident near Russell, Missouri, they felt it should be investigated further.
The object was checked for radioactivity and found to be non-radioactive.
The document indicates the object was cataloged as Artifact #341-7-471 and stored in the artifact room.
sighted object: unidentified object that struck the roof of a trailer house
